attributes.action: Introduce an MOT  test for Caravans and trailers, please
attributes.additional_details:
Please consider  an Annual  MOT  test for caravans and Boat Trailers.

Caravans and trailers  which are only used occaisionally  frequently have old  or un-serviceable tyres,   and other defective mechanical parts.

So please consider an annual MOT test for caravans and boat trailers.

Alternatively,  just make sure that they have not got   old unserviceable tyres.
